tweet: Honored and proud to serve with @RepEliotEngel as we work to maintain the bipartisan integrity of the House Foreign Affairs Committee. Thanks @susancrabtree @RealClearNews for highlighting. https://www.realclearpolitics.com/articles/2019/03/28/engel_mccaul_forge_rare_bipartisan_bond.html#2 …

Calling all local high school artists → My #TX10 district offices are accepting submissions for the 2019 #CongressionalArtCompetition. The deadline to submit artwork is April 26th.

Learn more:  http://bit.ly/mccaulartcomp  pic.twitter.com/JO5teHk9tS

It's no surprise that Texas’ booming economy continues to attract innovative companies, both large and small. @amazon expansion will help ensure #Austin remains at the cutting-edge of the tech that’s fueling and driving emerging markets. #TX10 https://twitter.com/statesman/status/1111230387051810816 …

Great to see the @TexasFarmBureau today and honored to receive the “Friend of Farm Bureau” Award for my support of farmers and policies that protect our vital agricultural resources. #TX10 pic.twitter.com/NU9mvD2HC1

My highest priorities in Congress are to keep #TX10 communities safe, fight #humantrafficking, and elevate the fight against #childhoodcancer. I’m proud of the meaningful reforms I championed to take significant steps forward in each of these areas.  http://bit.ly/2HBlVfd  pic.twitter.com/ldSzVCZPKa

Great meeting with John Harris of @alztex about the massive impact #Alzheimers is having on communities in Texas. Apart from the psychological and emotional impacts of the disease, it cost families and friends a total of 1.67 billion hours of unpaid care last year. #EndAlz pic.twitter.com/8GDwpsF5Dl

Productive meeting today with local business leaders to share how as the Leader of @HouseForeignGOP my goal is to advance the priorities of local communities in #TX, which exported over $260 billion in goods to foreign markets and have over 1 million Texas jobs reliant on trade. pic.twitter.com/UIpKnd5eqm

Thank you, @VP for highlighting these brave children and their wonderful families at the @WhiteHouse. I look forward to working with the Administration and my #childhoodcancer caucus to ensure we find the best legislative answers to end childhood cancer. https://twitter.com/VP/status/1108481221552717826 …

It's a tremendous honor to be recognized by @ACSCAN & one that I do not deserve alone. Thank you to all of our incredible activists and survivors who help me fight for more advancements in pediatric cancer treatment. More ⇩ http://bit.ly/2HyPJJt

Thank you to Mrs. Anderson's class for the incredibly warm welcome to Brenham Middle School. There is no bigger investment we can make in the future of our nation, than ensuring our children have boundless opportunities to thrive and achieve their dreams. pic.twitter.com/VaVAGe05Gx

Congrats to Coach Byron Smith & the entire @PVAMU’s men’s basketball team on an incredible season! Winning 21 of your last 22 games to make it to the dance for the first time since 1998 is surely something to be proud of. #pvnation #marchmadness http://bit.ly/2OhLrqa
Our strong job market is already pushing up wages more quickly, with hourly wages rising in February at the fastest pace in NINE years. http://bit.ly/2OcVQUa

Great tour of @armyfutures HQ in #ATX. This command is tasked with ensuring our armed forces are prepared for the future of warfare. Last year, I supported $96 billion in funding to modernize our armed forces, which will help the Austin economy and create more jobs in #TX10. pic.twitter.com/CCRjftIna5

Thank you to @USGLC for the dynamic conversation with @afsatweets’ Amb. Barbara Stephenson and @Trade4America’s Bill Lane on why America’s global leadership matters for Texans. #TX10 pic.twitter.com/XoCbfkOPqW

TUNE IN: As the Representative for #TX10 and the Leader of @HouseForeignGOP, I understand how and why America’s global leadership matters to local communities in Texas. Discussing those benefits NOW at #usglcTX http://bit.ly/2TAev25

Excited to join Liz Schrayer with @USGLC, Ambassador Barbara Stephenson with @afsatweets, and Bill Lane with @Trade4America to talk about how America's role in the world impacts #Texas:  http://bit.ly/2TAev25  #usglcTX

Great conversation this morning at @CFR_org with @frontlinepbs's Martin Smith on a variety of foreign affairs issues currently unfolding around the globe, including #Venezuela and #Syria. pic.twitter.com/m1Jf6dkFDh
Today we lost 49 innocent people in a place of worship. It is a tragic reminder that terrorism is a universal evil. I am grieving for the victims and the families who have lost loved ones today.

Today on #NationalAgDay I introduced the Student Agriculture Protection Act to inspire & incentivize students to continue in the farming business by allowing them to keep more of their hard-earned dollars from @NationalFFA, @4H, & similar ag programs.  http://bit.ly/2FcCko3  pic.twitter.com/CH9GNehlhD

Happy #NationalAgDay to all the hardworking men and women who fight to keep the United States a world leader in #agriculture and every Texas farmer, rancher, and producer that fuels families here in #TX10. pic.twitter.com/yPuLdio6Q6

Excited to announce that my #TX10 district offices are now accepting submissions for the 2019 Congressional Art Competition. Every year I continue to be stunned by the extraordinary work submitted by the young artists in #TX10. How to enter:  http://bit.ly/mccaulartcomp  pic.twitter.com/97WZ0MI0vY
Proud of #Houston for leading on new strategies to fight #humantrafficking in Texas and around the globe http://bit.ly/2CkbJU7

Ambassador Haber — it was an honor to speak with you about our important alliance and national security issues.

Enjoy your trip to #Texas! You will quickly discover it is the best state in the U.S. https://twitter.com/GermanAmbUSA/status/1105538814666256384 …

On behalf of the 7,000 constituents in #TX10 involved with @CARE, I met with the CEO of CARE USA, Michelle Nunn, about their humanitarian aid and development assistance programs around the world. pic.twitter.com/ktqdQuR3fy

Proud to be a co-sponsor on this important bill to strengthen our #nationalsecurity and to identify and stop terrorists before they travel. https://twitter.com/RepMichaelGuest/status/1104502120525516800 …

Welcome to #Houston, @SecPompeo! I’m glad you’ll hear from Texas' energy leaders at @CERAweek. Advancing our energy security is a critical aspect of U.S. foreign policy and Texas’ economy. https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1105365666024976385 …

I was proud to support @RepFitzpatrick’s bipartisan bill to ensure America leads international efforts to prevent financial transactions involving the proceeds from the horrific practice of #HumanTrafficking. #TX10 https://twitter.com/homelandprep/status/1105137398873231361 …

MYTH: #HR1 is for “We the People.”
FACT → #HR1 is big-government overreach that undermines Article I, Section 4 of the #Constitution.

Earlier this year I joined @POTUS and @IvankaTrump at the @WhiteHouse for the signing of the #WGDP Initiative, which aims to help 50 million women in developing countries realize their economic potential by 2025. I look forward to helping #WGDP make a real difference. #IWD

Proud to celebrate #InternationalWomensDay! As the father of four incredible girls, I'm devastated that one billion women face economic exclusion based solely on their gender. On @HouseForeignGOP I have supported measures that support women's global economic empowerment. pic.twitter.com/aJAJY2yotd

Fact → The ‘Democrat Politician Protection Act’ is a colossal Washington-knows-best, one-size-fits-all power grab intended to do one thing: serve the interests of politicians, not the American people. #HR1
You can read my full statement on this bill here: http://bit.ly/2SPjGpD

Congratulations to my friend @repdonyoung on becoming the longest-serving Republican Member of Congress! Your almost half-century of service in the House and life-long devotion to Alaska (along with your bellowing voice) will long echo throughout @USHouseHistory. pic.twitter.com/ZvZNIcvEjf
Great meeting with you, Swanpil! Thanks for stopping by the office. #TX10 https://twitter.com/HAAonline/status/1103370040269828096 …

Great to meet with Ambassador Amaral of Brazil about the importance of continuing to strengthen our countries’ bilateral relationship. I also thanked him for Brazil's support in addressing the ongoing crisis in #Venezuela. pic.twitter.com/TkXgNaOp3L

I questioned @DHSgov @SecNielsen at today's Homeland Security Committee Hearing about the ongoing security & humanitarian crisis at our southern border. @POTUS is correct: this is an emergency and we need dire action now. pic.twitter.com/HSTQsR3FGH

I applaud Guaido’s courageous return in the face of adversity by the Maduro regime. I continue to stand shoulder to shoulder with the people of #Venezuela in their fight to reclaim democracy. https://twitter.com/AmbJohnBolton/status/1103297201160228864 …

Today I met with the @PCDC_TX to discuss how I can best serve Pflugerville achieve its great economic potential. As one of the fastest growing cities in the nation, this city is a testament to how thriving businesses can build incredible communities. #TX10 pic.twitter.com/mpHFAdIuLp

Happy #TexasIndependenceDay to everyone across the great State of Texas. It’s a great honor to represent the birthplace of Texas in the U.S. Congress. There’s truly no better place to spend today than where #Texas became Texas! #DontMessWithTexas pic.twitter.com/JpWeJOBn65

The Grand Opening of @KatyFireDept’s Station No. 2 was a huge success. So glad to be a part of this special occasion and to see how this station will play an important role in our ability to respond to incidents of major flooding and keep our community safe. #TX10 #KatyTX pic.twitter.com/M6LqnoUp6b
